divs: Sighting DetailsMy friend was travelling to a wedding reception just south of Ilkeston uk last night, from just before J26 M1 both he and his wife saw to lights shoot straight across the motorway they were then visible shooting around all the way down to J25 M1were we got off. Didn't look like search lights, they moved to quick and randomly.,..
